# Speed Comparisons

Some quick and dirty speed comparisons between python, r, and julia all through quarto.

```{julia}
import Pkg; Pkg.add("BenchmarkTools", "PyCall", "RCall", "PythonCall")

using BenchmarkTools

@btime smallest_divisall(20)
@time smallest_divisall(20)
```

```{julia}
function smallest_divisall(n::Int64)
    for i=1:factorial(n)
        for j=1:n
            if i % j != 0
                break
            elseif j == n
                return i
            end
        end
    end
end
```


```{python}
from numba import jit
import numpy as np
from math import factorial

@jit
def smallest_divisall(n):
    for i in range(1, factorial(n) + 1):
        for j in range(1, n + 1):
            if i % j != 0:
                break
            elif j == n:
                return i

%time smallest_divisall(20)
```
